about_the_game:
Join World of SpaceDominator!

Start on your own planet from which you can go into universe!
expand your civilization, colonize planets, communicate, make enemies or friends, explore universe and experience adventures!

Explore universe!

Universe is unique for every player and that grants you great and unique experience! There can be big amount of stars, planets, comets and others you can explore. You can find resources, valuables, other ciilizations or other stuffs!

Expand your civilization!

Claim, buy or occupy planets. It depends on you how you will get colonies. Expanding is really important in order to advance in game and unlock new technologies. Colonies can be also used as spawnpoints!

Meet new civilizations!

You are not alone in universe. There is lot of other civilizations. Some may be friendly, some neutral and some agressive. Be carefull while communicating with them, you can make them angry or even hostile! Some can be smarter than you, some more stupid. Use them to your advantage. Connect with them or declare wars on them and expand yourself, unlock new technologies and increase your own intelligence!

Complete missions!

Other civilizations can give you missions to complete. You will receive rewards - money, valuables, unique items or even rocketships for completing missions!

Participate in events!

Events are a great way to get unique items, extra money or valuables. Participate in them regularly so you don't lose anything!

Choose your way

Do you want to be aggressive? Adapting to the situation? It's up to you. Any path can be used to your advantage and to complete the game. But remember, your every decision affects gameplay!

We guarantee "zero pay to win"

Pay to Win is loved by the rich and hated by the poor. That's why you will never find any P2W techniques in our games. You can't buy anything that affects gameplay with real money. You only get items that can be obtained without paying - such as skins.

Join the team and get advantages!

Boosters, chat, trading, rewards, events. These are just some of the benefits you get from joining a team!

For more information, visit our document

About our studio

BeyondPlanet is Indie studio. the only developer working on the game is "Lupe" and the only graphic designer is Tarox, who joined few weeks ago. So it is practically the work of two people! We would like to create more games in the future. We are from the northwest of Czech Republic. Lupe has been developing for 7 years and tried lot of languages ​​- PHP, Javascript, C ++, Java and now C#.

Will you give us a chance?

Don't forget to wishlist, you will not be disappointed!

Thank you for your support!

name: SpaceDominator

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 1200, i3-6100 or similar
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050 / RX 560 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 1600, i7-6700k or similar
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1080, RTX 2060, RX 5700 or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space

short_description: SpaceDominator is strategy fantasy open world where you can discover universe! Contact other civilizations, make friends or enemies, start trading or fighting, expand your own area or help others to expand, increase your intelligence level.. and much more! Follow developing http://discord.gg/cqEZJ5J
